sentences.en: " Now we shall see,'said the cobbler.
sentences.cn: “ 我们可以看到了, ” 皮匠说.

sentences.en: A cobbler passed his time in singing from morning till night.
sentences.cn: 皮匠从早到晚不停地唱歌.

sentences.en: A cobbler should stick to his last.
Cobbler should stick to his last.
sentences.cn: 补鞋匠只应守鞋楦头,人人各守本业,对别人的事少掺和.

sentences.en: Let the cobbler stick to his last.
Mock not a cobbler for his black thumbs.
The cobbler is a spy in disguise.
sentences.cn: 补鞋匠是个伪装的间谍.

sentences.en: The cobbler remained well - off, and everything he undertook prospered.
sentences.cn: 而鞋匠仍然很富裕, 他着手做的事情都很成功.

sentences.en: The cobbler should [ Let the cobbler ] stick to his last.
sentences.cn: ((谚))是鞋匠就该守着鞋楦 ( (人该守本分,不可越俎代庖 ) ).

sentences.en: The cobbler should stick to his last.
The cobbler's wife is the worst shoe.
The difference does not, for example, coincide with the difference between a manual and a mental job; a gardener or a cobbler may be a worker, a bank clerk a laborer.
sentences.cn: 这个区别不同于体力劳动和脑力劳动之间的区别；一个园艺工人或一个补鞋匠可能是工作者，一个银行职员可能是劳作者。

sentences.en: The monkey imitated everything that he saw the cobbler do.
sentences.cn: 这只猴子总是模仿它看见的一切举动.

words.tran_cn: 修，拙劣地修补；铺鹅卵石，用圆石铺面
补鞋匠；工匠；冷饮料；脆皮水果馅饼

phrases.tran_cn: (谚)管好自己懂得的事；不懂的事别插手

trans.tran_cn: 酥皮水果馅饼，修鞋匠，胡说，废话
trans.tran_en: someone who makes and repairs shoes
